snippet: The outcome could influence whether Toyota should be held responsible for sudden unintended acceleration as part of a larger group of lawsuits filed in state courts.
abstract: Los Angeles jury clears Toyota Motor of fault in a fatal 2009 accident in which a 66-year-old woman crashed her Camry.
lead_paragraph: The outcome could influence whether Toyota should be held responsible for sudden unintended acceleration as part of a larger group of lawsuits filed in state courts.

headline.main: Jury Finds Toyota Not Liable in Death of California Driver
headline.print_headline: Jury Finds Toyota Not Liable In Death of California Driver
